title: Add documentation for P6Spy support
body:
Ref #29052.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Add documentation for P6Spy support. For #31814 . One important point to note here is that the P6Spy SPI implementation was actually only added for MySQL.
  - Fixes https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/actions/runs/12316270364/job/34376201179 . Fix NativeTest failure due to class changes.
  - Bump GraalVM Native Build Tools to 0.10.4 . This is mainly influenced by https://github.com/graalvm/native-build-tools/pull/635 .
  - Replace the OpenGauss Docker Image of nativeTest under GraalVM Native Image from `opengauss/opengauss:5.0.0` to `enmotech/opengauss-lite:5.1.0`. Although `opengauss/opengauss` is still confirmed as the official Docker Image of OpenGauss in places such as https://opengauss.org/zh/news/2023-03-10/ , it is no longer updated. Articles like https://opengauss.org/zh/blogs/zhengwen2/openGauss%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%AE%89%E8%A3%85%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95(docker).html indicate that the OpenGauss community prefers the Docker Images of `enmotech/opengauss` and `enmotech/opengauss-lite`. Due to issues like https://github.com/enmotech/enmotech-docker-opengauss/issues/52 , `enmotech/opengauss` cannot be used in WSL or Dev Container. Using `enmotech/opengauss-lite` is a more reasonable choice.
  - Remove dependency on `org.testcontainers:clickhouse` until https://github.com/testcontainers/testcontainers-java/issues/8736 is resolved.

---
